items.question: Vypi코te k칩dy a n치zvy v코ech p콏edm캩t콢.
Semestry se콏azen칠 podle roku sestupn캩.
items.expectedSql: SELECT name, year FROM semesters ORDER BY year DESC

items.question: P콏edm캩ty s k칩dem za캜칤naj칤c칤m na 'EBC'.
items.expectedSql: SELECT * FROM courses WHERE code LIKE 'EBC%' LIMIT 20

items.question: Z치znamy kde nikdo neprosp캩l na A.
items.expectedSql: SELECT * FROM success_rates WHERE grade_a = 0 LIMIT 20

items.question: K칩d p콏edm캩tu, semestr a po캜et zn치mek A.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, s.name, sr.grade_a FROM success_rates sr JOIN courses c ON sr.course_id = c.id JOIN semesters s ON sr.semester_id = s.id LIMIT 20

items.question: Fakulta a semestr pro ka쬯칳 z치znam.
items.expectedSql: SELECT f.name as fakulta, s.name as semestr FROM semesters s JOIN faculties f ON s.faculty_id = f.id

items.question: P콏edm캩ty bez z치znamu o 칰sp캩코nosti.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.* FROM courses c LEFT JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id WHERE sr.id IS NULL LIMIT 20

items.question: Celkov칳 po캜et p콏edm캩t콢 v datab치zi.
items.expectedSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as pocet_predmetu FROM courses

items.question: Po캜et 칰sp캩코n칳ch student콢 pro ka쬯칳 p콏edm캩t.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, c.name, SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) as uspesnych FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id WHERE sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY uspesnych DESC LIMIT 10

items.question: P콏edm캩ty s 칰sp캩코nost칤 pod 50%.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, c.name, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(sr.grade_a+sr.grade_b+sr.grade_c+sr.grade_d+sr.grade_e) / NULLIF(SUM(sr.grade_a+sr.grade_b+sr.grade_c+sr.grade_d+sr.grade_e+sr.grade_f+sr.grade_fn), 0), 1) as uspesnost FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id WHERE sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id HAVING uspesnost < 50 ORDER BY uspesnost

items.question: Jak치 je 칰sp캩코nost u TZI?
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, c.name, SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) as proslo, SUM(sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn) as neproslo, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) / NULLIF(SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e + sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn), 0), 1) as uspesnost_procent FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id WHERE c.code LIKE '%TZI%' AND sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id

items.question: Top 5 nejt캩쮄뫆셖h p콏edm캩t콢 na PEF.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, c.name, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) / NULLIF(SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e + sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn), 0), 1) as uspesnost, SUM(sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn) as neproslo FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id JOIN semesters s ON sr.semester_id = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%PEF%' AND sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id HAVING uspesnost IS NOT NULL ORDER BY uspesnost ASC LIMIT 5

items.question: Porovn치n칤 칰sp캩코nosti TZI, ALG a EBC-IV.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, c.name, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) / NULLIF(SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e + sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn), 0), 1) as uspesnost FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id WHERE c.code IN ('EBC-TZI', 'EBC-ALG', 'EBC-IV') AND sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY uspesnost DESC

items.question: Kter치 fakulta m치 nejvy코코칤 칰sp캩코nost?
items.expectedSql: SELECT f.name as fakulta, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e) / NULLIF(SUM(sr.grade_a + sr.grade_b + sr.grade_c + sr.grade_d + sr.grade_e + sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn), 0), 1) as uspesnost, COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as pocet_predmetu FROM faculties f JOIN semesters s ON f.id = s.faculty_id JOIN success_rates sr ON s.id = sr.semester_id JOIN courses c ON sr.course_id = c.id WHERE sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY uspesnost DESC

items.question: Rozlo쬰n칤 zn치mek u p콏edm캩tu ALG.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, s.name as semestr, sr.grade_a as A, sr.grade_b as B, sr.grade_c as C, sr.grade_d as D, sr.grade_e as E, sr.grade_f as F, sr.grade_fn as FN FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id JOIN semesters s ON sr.semester_id = s.id WHERE c.code LIKE '%ALG%' AND sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' ORDER BY s.year DESC
